translation.en: GIRL 1: Today's the day. GIRL 2: All right.
GIRL 3: I feel good about this one. GIRL 1: Us three witches are fire.
translation.ko: - 이번엔 느낌이 좋아 - 우리 세 마녀는 위대해

translation.en: GIRL 2: I don't know why we keep trying without a fourth.
translation.ko: 네 번째 마녀도 없는데 왜 자꾸 하는지 모르겠어

translation.en: GIRL 1: Oh, here she goes.
GIRL 2: What? It's been two years.
GIRL 1: Maybe we don't need a fourth.
translation.ko: 네 번째 마녀는 필요 없을지도 몰라

translation.en: GIRL 2: Yeah, you need all four.
Each crescent moon is an element.
translation.ko: - 넷 다 있어야지 - 각 초승달이 원소야 - 응 - 보이지?

translation.en: See? North, south, east, west.
GIRL 3: I wanna freeze time.
GIRL 1: We couldn't freeze time if we had a fourth.
translation.ko: 그건 안 될걸 네 명이 있대도 못 해

translation.en: I have it on the table, Frankie. You need to hold it, or else
translation.ko: - 테이블 위에 있어, 프랭키 - 꽉 잡아, 물건에 불붙겠다

translation.en: you're gonna light something on fire. All right, ladies.
GIRL 2: I love this plate.
Don't put it out.
I have to. We have to do the ritual. Your feather.
translation.ko: - 의식 치르려면 어쩔 수 없어 - 깃털 타겠다

translation.en: Frankie, watch out. You're always lighting things on fire, bro.
translation.ko: 프랭키, 조심 좀 해 넌 매번 뭘 태워 먹잖아, 친구

translation.en: Not this time. GIRL 1: Y'all witches ready?
ALL [CHANTING]: As the night receives Your light And the oceans feel your pull
translation.ko: 밤이 당신의 빛을 받으사 바다가 당신의 채움을 느끼사

translation.en: I set my intention To grow with you From new to full
translation.ko: 제가 당신과 함께 성장하길 바라옵니다, 달이 차오르는 것처럼

translation.en: I summon the spirits of the North,
spirit of earth and body, spirit of dirt.
translation.ko: 땅과 몸의 기운 흙의 기운을 소환합니다

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
I summon the spirits of the East,
spirit of air, spirit of new beginnings, spirit of breath.
translation.ko: 동쪽의 기운과 함께 공기의 기운 새로운 시작의 기운 숨의 기운을 소환합니다

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
I summon the spirits of the South, spirit of fire and will, spirit of heat.
translation.ko: 남쪽의 기운과 함께 불과 의지의 기운, 열의 기운을 소환합니다

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
Tabby, can you just pretend
you didn't summon the Southern spirits
translation.ko: 태비, 네가 그냥 남쪽의 기운 소환 안 한 척하고 서쪽도 소환하면 안 돼?

translation.en: and do the spirits of the West?
translation.ko: 소환 안 한 척하고 서쪽도 소환하면 안 돼?

translation.en: What? No. That's whack. I already did mine.
translation.ko: 뭐? 싫어, 그건 반칙이야 난 내 거 했어

translation.en: Someone needs to. It's not gonna work otherwise.
translation.ko: 누군가는 해야 해 안 그러면 소용없어

translation.en: If we're gonna be honest,
the spirits of the West have been messin' shit up for a while now,
translation.ko: 서쪽의 기운이 골치 썩인 지 좀 됐잖아

translation.en: so why don't we just leave 'em out.
She's got a valid point. And, look, anyways, it starts with East.
translation.ko: 프랭키 말도 일리 있네 그리고 어쨌든 동쪽부터 불러야 해

translation.en: East, South, West--
See, this is why we can only do basic magick.
translation.ko: 이러니까 우리가 기초 마법에 머무는 거야

translation.en: We've never had a fourth.
How many times have we tried to telepathically communicate?
translation.ko: 텔레파시로 소통하려고 우리가 몇 번이나 시도했어?

translation.en: Oh, my God! You're obsessed
with telepathically communicating.
Read the book.
"So it shall be sealed and done
When all four corners Meet as one"
Wait, wait, wait.
Oh, shit!
It's your jam. Yes! Okay, here we go.
Shit. You know the words.
Aw. Sorry.
Aw, baby. Ugh. Blah.
Oh, no, no, no. You can...cry.
All right, get it out.
Oh, honey, I'm...
I get it, man. This is...
This is weird, though, isn't it?
Look it, we're having all the feels.
You'll have to do my makeup when we get there.
translation.ko: 울컥해 죽겠다, 이따가 네가 나 화장해줘, 도착해서 말이야

translation.en: Okay. I got you.
Turn it back up, please.
How are my brows? They look great.
Okay.
Okay.
You look beautiful. Oh, gosh.
You do.
Okay. I do.
You ready? I'm nervous.
Yeah. Yeah. Okay.
All right, let's do this. Okay.
Hello.
Hey. Hey.
I see you made it in one piece. Yeah, it's--
translation.ko: - 안녕 - 무사히 잘 왔네 응, 그럼, 어머나

translation.en: Oh, God.
Is that another piece of you I see right here?
translation.ko: 당신의 분신이 여기 있네? 안녕, 릴리

translation.en: Hi, Lily. I finally got you here.
It's nice to see you again.
Last time was on your turf though, so now it's my home-court advantage.
translation.ko: 지난번엔 네 구역이었지만, 오늘은 내가 홈구장의 이점을 가졌단다

translation.en: That's a sports metaphor.
A metaphor, sort of like analogy. Oh, yeah. I get it.
Yeah, I get it. Dad joke. Guilty.
That's a cool camera.
Thanks. HELEN: It is, isn't it?
Let's take a picture. You know? Commemorate the moment. That's a great idea.
May I? Okay.
It's not really a selfie thing, but here.
Ooh, wow, analog.
Dig it. Old school.
Ready?
All right. Come on in and meet the boys.
They're really excited to meet you.
I think they even bathed.
ADAM: This is Isaiah. Hey.
ADAM: Jacob. Hi.
ADAM: And Abe.
Hi.
JACOB: What the hell? Hey, give Lily the good seat.
Move over. Move. [BOTH GRUNTING]
Isaiah, just move over! Cut it out, hey!
Move.
Settle down.
A little birdie told me mint chip was your favorite.
translation.ko: 민트 칩을 좋아한다고 아기 새가 말해주더라

translation.en: Thanks. Isn't that right, little birdie? Mm-hm.
My beautiful little birdie.
That's gross, Dad.
Hey. Hey.
Nice digs.
You okay?
Yeah.
How you feeling about school tomorrow?
Are you excited?
You can make some new friends.
translation.ko: 새 친구 사귈 생각에 설레니? 다른 친구도 있는 것처럼 들리네요

translation.en: Well, that would imply that I had old friends.
There's gonna be D-bags no matter where you go, right?
Mom. It's not nice. Sorry.
It's "douchebags."
"Douchebags"? I was going for "dickbags."
All right. Just remember what I always tell you.
Your difference is your power.
Okay, on that note, I'm gonna go unpack. Okay.
translation.ko: - 그럼 엄마는 가서 짐 풀게 - 네

translation.en: Love you. I love you.
Hey. Thank you for just being so cool...
Mom. ...about all of this.
I know it feels fast. Mom, I'm not judging you at all.
translation.ko: - 빠른 거 알아 - 엄마, 저 원망 안 해요

translation.en: I just have not connected to someone like this for so long,
translation.ko: 이렇게 누군가를 만난 게 정말 오랜만인데 정말 기분이 좋아 누군가가 옆에…

translation.en: and, God, it just feels really good, like, you know, to have someone to...
I get it.
All right, baby. Get some rest. Okay.
Oh...love you. Love you.
Love you, love you, love you. Love you, love you.
What's up?
Nice kicks.
Thanks, yo.
Have a good first day.
Thanks.
I know why the caged bird Sings, ah me
translation.ko: 새장에 갇힌 새가 왜 노래하는지 나는 아네

translation.en: When his wing is bruised And his bosom sore,--
translation.ko: 언제 날개에 멍이 들고 가슴이 쓰라린지

translation.en: When he beats his bars And he would be free;
translation.ko: 언제 새장을 두드리고 자유를 원하는지를 아네

translation.en: But a prayer that he sends From his heart's deep core
translation.ko: 그의 마음 깊은 곳에서 보내는 기도이다

translation.en: But a plea, that upward To Heaven he flings--
I know why The caged bird sings!
translation.ko: 새장에 갇힌 새가 왜 노래하는지 나는 아네!

translation.en: Okay, this week we're gonna be reading chapters one through four
translation.ko: 자, 우리가 이번 주에 1장에서 4장을 읽을 책은

translation.en: of Maya Angelou's seminal autobiography,
which draws its title--
Ew! God, are you seeing this?
Timmy. I'm sorry.
TEACHER: Okay, what's going on? TIMMY: Hey.
Hi. I think you dropped something.
Oh, my God.
It's super gnarly.
translation.ko: - 완전 역겨워 - 거기 뒤에 진정 좀 하지?

translation.en: Can we settle down back there, please? Let's go. Jacob.
translation.ko: - 완전 역겨워 - 거기 뒤에 진정 좀 하지? 수업하자 - 제이컵 - 범죄 현장 아니냐?

translation.en: TIMMY: It's like a crime scene.
Hey, hey. All right, enough. Settle down.
GIRL 1: Hello?
I think she's in here.
GIRL 2: Hello?
Listen. It happens to everyone. Timmy's just a dick.
translation.ko: 있잖아, 누구나 그럴 수 있어 티미는 그냥 개자식이야

translation.en: Seriously, don't waste your tears on him. GIRL 2: I mean, you're not alone.
translation.ko: 그런 애 때문에 울지 마 너만 그런 거 아니야

translation.en: He's made us all cry at one point or another.
translation.ko: 걔 때문에 우리도 한두 번은 울었거든

translation.en: Also, girl, your flow is heavy and that is something to celebrate.
translation.ko: 그리고 너 순환이 잘되니까 축하할 일이기도 해

translation.en: Frankie. Frankie, bro.
What? I'm just saying. Aunt Flo's in from the Redland.
translation.ko: - 프랭키, 친구야 - 왜? 난 그냥 빨간 나라에 사는 이모 얘기를 한 거야

translation.en: GIRL 1: We brought you some shorts.
I wore 'em in gym, so they're kinda sweaty, but they should fit you.
translation.ko: 체육 시간에 입어서 축축하지만 너한테 맞을 거야

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I'll just slide them under the door.
LILY: Thank you.
You can sit with us if you want.
Not that anybody really wants to sit with us anyways.
Thanks, guys.
Oh, my God. Did he just look at you?
translation.ko: - 세상에, 방금 쟤가 너 쳐다봤어? - 진정해

translation.en: Down, girl. Frankie's been in love
translation.ko: - 세상에, 방금 쟤가 너 쳐다봤어? - 진정해 프랭키가 5학년 때부터 제이컵을 좋아했거든

translation.en: with Jacob since the fifth grade.
[LAUGHING] What? No, no. No.
No. He's kinda my brother.
Come a-who? Stepbrother.
Or soon-to-be stepbrother.
Sorry, I just have really bad cramps.
Been there. TABBY: Same.
Can't relate, but sorry.
Um... LILY: What?
Hey, we should hang out after school this week.
translation.ko: 이번 주에 학교 끝나고 우리랑 놀자

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah. Yeah.
Okay.
Mom?
Hello?
Get out!
Oh, God.
Mmm. You want a sip? Sure.
Mom! You know I can't control myself.
translation.ko: - 엄마! - 난 흥을 주체 못 하잖아

translation.en: That's very good. Okay, okay.
Show me your dance moves.
Oh, my gosh.
That's so sweet.
Hey.
What's all that?
Oh...I just had to go through some paperwork for your new school, but you know me.
translation.ko: 새 학교 관련 서류 좀 보고 있었어

translation.en: I put all the important shit in a shoebox, and it makes it impossible to find.
translation.ko: 중요한 건 죄다 신발 상자에 넣었더니 찾을 수가 없네

translation.en: Adam says he's gonna get me organized, so I'm taking it down to the office,
but I told him not to get his hopes up, so...
Hey, um, thanks for washing my jeans, by the way.
What jeans?
The ones I bled through today. I didn't.
translation.ko: - 오늘 피 흘린 바지요 - 나 아닌데

translation.en: Maybe it was Adam.
Look who it is. Just in time for first period.
translation.ko: 이게 누구야 생리학 시간에 딱 맞춰 왔네

translation.en: Timmy. You know what helps with cramps?
Sex.
GIRL: That was, like, insane.
TEACHER: Both of you, principal's office now.
translation.ko: 너무 심했다 둘 다 교장실로 당장 와라!

translation.en: VOICE: Lily. What?
Ms. Schechner, who are you speaking to?
Didn't you just call my name? No.
VOICE: If you can hear this, you're our fourth.
translation.ko: 내 말이 들리면 네가 우리의 네 번째야

translation.en: Go to the bathroom.
Yes? Can I go to the bathroom?
Sure. Make it quick.
VOICE: Take your stuff.
You need your backpack? TIMMY: You didn't get the memo?
She's on the rag.
My bad.
That's good. Double detention. Anything else?
For what?
Oh, shit! I told y'all haters she was the fourth!
translation.ko: 대박! 내가 말했지 릴리가 네 번째라니까!

translation.en: FRANKIE: Yes, yes, y'all!
It's the motherfricking reckoning!
I can't even believe this. We on a other, other level.
translation.ko: 이게 꿈이야, 생시야 - 우린 레벨이 달라 - 너희 뭐 한 거야?

translation.en: What the hell, you guys?
translation.ko: - 우린 레벨이 달라 - 너희 뭐 한 거야?

translation.en: We sent you a message telepathically.
Yeah. Just, like, telepathically communicating with you. NBD.
translation.ko: 너랑 텔레파시로 소통한 건데 별거 아니야

translation.en: JK. It's, like, a VBD for sure, because now you're actually here
translation.ko: 농담이고, 아주 대단한 일이지 너는 지금 여기 왔고, 우리는 현실에서 엄청난 일을 해냈잖아

translation.en: and we on some shit IRL.
translation.ko: 너는 지금 여기 왔고, 우리는 현실에서 엄청난 일을 해냈잖아

translation.en: Okay. Can somebody translate?
Okay. It was a test to see if your antennas were up.
translation.ko: 그러니까 너한테 안테나가 있는지 확인하는 실험을 한 거야

translation.en: And they up! Way up.
They up! What do you mean? How?
Well, we practiced a lot of times, but we never got it quite right.
translation.ko: 연습은 많이 했었는데 성공한 적은 없었어

translation.en: But, I mean, today, it was like...
Super Tampon to the rescue!
That's you. Sorry, is it too soon?
So how long have you been practicing?
Practicing? Yeah.
translation.ko: - 넌 얼마나 연습한 거야? - 연습? 응

translation.en: Oh. No, I never, like, practiced anything before.
translation.ko: 연습 같은 거 한 적 없어

translation.en: Okay, so, like, when did you start getting a sense of your gift?
translation.ko: 그럼 재능이 있다는 건 언제 알아챘어?

translation.en: What are you guys talking about?
What? FRANKIE: We're witches.
translation.ko: - 무슨 재능? - 우린 마녀야, 내 손 잡아

translation.en: Take my hand. It's okay. Come with me.
translation.ko: - 무슨 재능? - 우린 마녀야, 내 손 잡아 괜찮으니까, 이리 와 오늘 배울 게 많겠다

translation.en: We're gonna learn a lot today.
translation.ko: 괜찮으니까, 이리 와 오늘 배울 게 많겠다

translation.en: You're witches? Yep.
And you're a witch too!
LILY: Sorry, this is all just a little new to me.
translation.ko: 미안한데 이 모든 게 나한테 좀 낯설어

translation.en: TABBY: I mean, it's new to us too.
We've never thrown a grown-ass man. LOURDES: That was so wild!
translation.ko: - 다 큰 남자를 던진 적은 없거든 - 진짜 통쾌했어!

translation.en: Yeah, and, like, we all thought it at the same time.
Wait, what?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 뭐라고? 던지고 싶다는 생각 안 했어?

translation.en: Tell me you didn't think about throwing his ass off of you.
Yeah, I did. LOURDES: Well, so did we!
And then, bam!
And that's just stage one, moving stuff with our minds.
translation.ko: 그게 바로 1단계야 생각으로 물건을 움직이는 거지

translation.en: LOURDES: Or people, I guess, in Timmy's case.
translation.ko: 아니면 티미 사건처럼 사람을 움직일 수도 있어

translation.en: If he even counts as a person. True that. Anything.
translation.ko: - 티미도 사람으로 친다면 - 맞아 - 뭐든 - 2단계는 뭐게?

translation.en: Stage two? That's what went down in detention.
translation.ko: - 뭐든 - 2단계는 뭐게? 네가 벌 받을 때 일어났던 일이야

translation.en: That was so sick! And you said we couldn't do it.
translation.ko: 진짜 끝내줬어! 넌 우리가 못 할 거라며

translation.en: Stage three, we'll get to soon enough.
LOURDES: Let's surprise her, though.
Stage four, shape-shifting.
Shape-shifting.
translation.ko: 변신? 다른 모양으로 바꾸는 힘 있잖아

translation.en: You know, the power to take on a different form?
And if we get to stage four, I'm low-key turning myself into Kristen Stewart.
translation.ko: 4단계에 이르면 난 아무도 몰래 크리스틴 스튜어트가 될 거야

translation.en: Don't judge. She's a Twilight stan.
Point is, we've never made it past stage one.
translation.ko: 중요한 건, 1단계 이상 성공한 적이 없다는 거야 - 없었지 - 그런데 로버트 패틴슨이 왔어

translation.en: And then in walks Robert Pattinson.
Bro!
What? You tell me she's not giving off
translation.ko: - 친구! - 왜? 지금 릴리한테 에드워드 분위기가 안 풍긴다는 거야?

translation.en: Edward Cullen vibes right now.
translation.ko: 지금 릴리한테 에드워드 분위기가 안 풍긴다는 거야?

translation.en: I'm sorry, can you guys just slow down? I'm having a hard time catching up.
translation.ko: 미안한데, 천천히 말해줄래? 무슨 소리인지 이해가 잘 안 돼

translation.en: Okay, well, why don't you tell us a little about you.
translation.ko: 그래, 그럼 먼저 네 소개 좀 해줘

translation.en: Yeah, like, what's your ancestry?
Uh...I don't really know. I've never looked into it before.
translation.ko: 나도 잘 몰라 한 번도 알아본 적이 없어

translation.en: FRANKIE: What about your mom?
Is she a witch?
She's a therapist from New Jersey.
It's gotta come from somewhere.
Yeah, you see, we've been looking for our fourth for a while now.
translation.ko: 맞아, 네 번째 마녀를 한참 찾아다녔어

translation.en: We thought we could form a coven, just us three--
translation.ko: 우리 셋만 있어도 마녀 집회가 형성될 줄 알았는데

translation.en: It doesn't work like that.
No, because, you see, we each have
translation.ko: 불가능해, 왜냐하면 우리는 각 방향에 상응하는 원소를 맡고 있거든

translation.en: an element that corresponds to a direction.
translation.ko: 우리는 각 방향에 상응하는 원소를 맡고 있거든

translation.en: I'm fire.
Air. Earth.
So you've got North, South, East...
But West, that was a tough get.
LOURDES: And now you're here.
You're water. You're West.
Yeah, in order for us to have, like, maximum power,
we all need to be on our directions.
The term is "calling the corners." Okay. Um...
This is a lot, but I am listening
and also working through a low-level panic attack.
translation.ko: 그리고 공황 발작도 살짝 겪는 중이야

translation.en: Okay, we know that this is probably a lot to take in right now.
translation.ko: 알아, 지금 당장은 받아들이기 벅찰 거야

translation.en: But you shouldn't run from your power. None of us should.
translation.ko: 하지만 네 힘을 외면하면 안 돼 우리도 마찬가지고

translation.en: That's what my mom always says.
"Your difference is your power."
Oh, then Mom's cool. So, what do you say?
translation.ko: - 어머님 멋지시다 - 그래서 네 결정은 뭐야?

translation.en: Lily. Oh, my God, Frankie.
Give me your hand. Come on.
Will you be our fourth?
Come on, I got bad knees.
Her ACLs are gonna tear.
You had me at shape-shifting into Kristen Stewart.
translation.ko: 크리스틴 스튜어트 얘기에서 이미 마음 정했어

translation.en: She said yes! She said yes. Oh, my God!
Why didn't you just say yes originally?
translation.ko: - 왜 진작 말 안 했어? - 가자

translation.en: I mean, witchcraft in general is such a charged word.
We literally house babies in our stomachs.
translation.ko: 우리는 말 그대로 배 속에 아기를 키우잖아

translation.en: That's some Ridley Scott shit.
We have superpowers without even trying.
translation.ko: 노력 안 해도 초능력이 있는 셈이지

translation.en: I mean, not all of us can do that, but...
Shit. You know, point taken. My bad, Lou.
translation.ko: - 예외는 있지만… - 너무해 네 마음 이해했어, 미안, 루

translation.en: Yeah, it's all good. Y'all know trans girls got our own magick anyway.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 트랜스 여성도 우리만의 마법이 있어

translation.en: Word. They do, they do.
That's why covens have always been so important.
Because half the battle of having powers is believing you do.
translation.ko: 서로 믿는 데서 우리 힘이 나오거든

translation.en: What are we doing?
Well, now that we got our fourth, we need to take our coven for a test drive.
translation.ko: 네 번째 마녀도 구했겠다 우리의 힘을 시험해봐야지

translation.en: FRANKIE: Whenever we do a spell, we always cast a circle first.
translation.ko: 주문을 외울 때마다 먼저 마법 원을 만들어야 해

translation.en: Think of it as, you know, making a container
translation.ko: 상자를 만든다고 생각하면 돼 우리의 에너지를 가두는 상자 같은 거야

translation.en: to hold all of our energies.
translation.ko: 우리의 에너지를 가두는 상자 같은 거야

translation.en: And to keep the bad shit out.
Breathe.
Listen to the sound of the trees breathing along with you.
translation.ko: 당신을 따라 호흡하는 나무의 숨소리를 듣습니다

translation.en: Feel yourself rooted into the ground and into this moment.
translation.ko: 이 순간에 땅속에 뿌리내린 당신의 존재를 느낍니다

translation.en: We transcend time.
We suspend fate.
We bear the three keys.
translation.ko: 세 개의 열쇠를 가졌습니다 아, 맞다

translation.en: [WHISPERS] We open the triple gate.
We open the triple gate.
FRANKIE, LOURDES & TABBY: The air, the fire, the water, the earth
Return, return, return
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
ALL [CHANTING]: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return.
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
Guys.
Holy shit.
Damn!
LOURDES: Oh, my God! That was so fricking cool!
[ALL SCREAMING, CHATTERING] What?
That was brazy, though!
Never?
Yo! No, no, no. No!
FRANKIE: That's stage three, baby.
translation.ko: - 완전 처음이야 - 이게 3단계였어, 베이비 자, 시간을 멈출 수 있으면 이제 뭘 해야 하지?

translation.en: TABBY: Okay, but if we could do that, now what should we do?
translation.ko: 자, 시간을 멈출 수 있으면 이제 뭘 해야 하지?

translation.en: Why are we at Timmy's house? He's a terrorist.
translation.ko: - 티미네 집은 왜 온 거야? - 테러리스트니까

translation.en: That's a little extreme.
We don't wanna hurt him, though, right?
translation.ko: 그건 너무 심했다 - 해치지는 않을 거지? - 왜 안 돼?

translation.en: Why not?
translation.ko: - 해치지는 않을 거지? - 왜 안 돼?

translation.en: No, she's right. Hexing is serious.
So is harassment.
Everybody relax. We're not hexing him.
translation.ko: 다들 진정해 흑마법 부리러 온 게 아니라

translation.en: We'll just cast a spell to make him less of a garbage person.
translation.ko: 덜 쓰레기로 만드는 주문을 걸려고 온 거잖아

translation.en: LILY: How do you know no one's home?
Bull's-eye. Ha, ha! Come on.
FRANKIE: Oh, my God.
I'll take the lead on this one.
I can wing it.
You guys, we shouldn't be doing this.
Okay, we need something from his physical person to cast the spell.
translation.ko: 마법을 걸려면 티미의 신체 일부가 필요해

translation.en: Twist.
No way. No way. Timmy full of surprises.
translation.ko: - 뭐? - 설마, 그럴 리가 - 놀라움의 연속이네 - 얘 점괘판 쓰는 애였어?

translation.en: LOURDES: Naw, this boy has a Ouija board?
translation.ko: - 놀라움의 연속이네 - 얘 점괘판 쓰는 애였어?

translation.en: Guys?
I think I found something from his physical person.
translation.ko: 티미의 신체 일부를 찾은 거 같아

translation.en: Oh, no way. No. No. That is not a used--
Low-key kinda surprised he used a condom.
Frankie, don't touch that!
Come on, it's...
It's definitely his most powerful element.
I hate to give it to her, but Frankie's kinda right, guys.
This is so gross.
Okay. We need a caldron.
What?
TABBY: Bong.
Okay, what do I do?
Rose oil.
Hurl. I'm gonna hurl.
Don't let it touch you, bro.
Don't! Frankie. Bro.
Angelica. Rose quartz.
We call upon the Goddess of Holy Mysteries.
You're doin' it. In spirit and in body...
and in perfect love and perfect trust,
may we...
awaken Timmy to his, uh...
to his highest self.
From this day forth.
Blessed be.
ALL: Blessed be.
LOURDES: Do it, girl. TABBY: Do it.
Get it. LOURDES: Get it on that pillow.
Gross! Do it.
MAN: Timmy? Shit, guys.
Shit! Oh, my God.
Shit!
No! What do we do?
We gotta jump. We gotta jump.
There's a clear shot out this window. We're on the second story.
It's our only option. Come on.
Can't you guys just make us fly or something?
Bitch, no!
MAN: Timmy, no video games until you finish your homework.
translation.ko: 티미, 비디오 게임은 숙제 마치고 해라

translation.en: TIMMY: Yeah, I know, Dad.
FRANKIE: Lily! Come on!
Run!
Yes!
♪ I see you so Uncomfortably alone ♪
She taught us all to read auras.
Blessed be thy sight
ALL [CHANTING]: The Maiden, The Mother, The Crone
The Maiden, The Mother, The Crone
The Maiden, The Mother, The Crone
'Sup, bitch! I'm sorry.
What you gonna do about it? What are you gonna do?
translation.ko: 네가 뭘 어쩔 건데? 어쩔 거냐고

translation.en: Air. Fire.
Water. Earth.
Air. Fire.
Water. Earth.
Lily. Hey.
I was starting to get a little worried.
translation.ko: - 릴리, 걱정하고 있었잖아 - 엄마 네, 죄송해요 친구들이랑 놀았어요

translation.en: Yeah, sorry, I was just hanging out with my friends.
Friends?
Yes. Radical, I know.
ADAM: Hey, Helen, is Lily up there with you?
Listen, sweetie, we gotta talk about something.
Um, I get back from a week away doing groups
translation.ko: 있잖아, 딸, 할 얘기가 있어 강연 갔다가 일주일 만에 왔는데

translation.en: and Jacob tells me you assaulted Timmy Andrews?
[STAMMERING] No, I was defending myself. He said Timmy didn't lay a hand on you.
translation.ko: - 저를 방어한 거예요 - 티미는 너한테 손도 안 댔다던데

translation.en: Well, he whispered something in my ear-- He whispered something so you hit him?
translation.ko: - 제 귀에 속삭였어요, 그래서… - 귓속말을 해서 때렸다고?

translation.en: Well, if you'd just let me finish--
When I am speaking, please don't interrupt me.
HELEN: Uh, okay... Thank you.
Mom, please--
Adam, let's take a step back here for a second, all right?
translation.ko: 애덤, 한 걸음만 물러나서 생각하면 안 될까?

translation.en: She was defending herself.
Well, I'm sure the circumstances were complicated, but...
You know, with my boys,
I have to have a zero-tolerance policy when it comes to violence.
translation.ko: 폭력에 관해서는 절대로 그냥 안 넘어가

translation.en: That's the way it's always been in this house. So...
More than anything, I'm disappointed, Lily, in you.
Really disappointed in you.
Wow. Way to stick it to the man, Mom. Lily.
HELEN: You just need to be more kind in the way that you speak to her.
translation.ko: 릴리한테 좀 더 다정하게 말했으면 좋겠어

translation.en: ADAM: Kind? HELEN: Yes!
ADAM: Yeah, discipline, it's all about kindness.
HELEN: That's not what I meant.
ADAM: She has an attitude, Helen. She comes in here all holier-than-thou.
translation.ko: 애가 건방지잖아, 헬렌 굽힐 줄을 모른다고

translation.en: It's uncomfortable for everyone. HELEN: It's complicated for her!
Hey. [GASPS] Sorry.
What are you doing out here? I just like to come here to think.
translation.ko: - 여기서 뭐 해? - 생각할 게 있어서

translation.en: Get away from the noise. You know?
Yeah.
Listen, my dad can be strict but he does it out of love.
translation.ko: 저기, 우리 아빠가 엄하긴 해도 사랑해서 그러시는 거야

translation.en: You know?
He always says: "Power equals order."
I mean, there's a reason why he's gotten to where he has.
translation.ko: 아빠가 그 자리에 오른 데는 그럴 만한 이유가 있겠지

translation.en: People travel from all over the world
to hear him speak about this kind of stuff.
Right.
So, what about your dad?
I've never met him.
I don't even know his name.
NARRATOR [ON TV]: So you two wanna have sex.
Let's talk ground rules.
translation.ko: 필수 절차를 살펴봅시다 첫 번째는 동의입니다

translation.en: Number one: Consent.
translation.ko: 필수 절차를 살펴봅시다 첫 번째는 동의입니다 언제라도 거절할 권리가 있습니다

translation.en: At any moment, it is your right to say stop.
Sure, if you wanna give him blue balls.
TEACHER: Hey, Jeremy. I'm sorry.
NARRATOR: Consent is defined as an affirmative, unambiguous and a voluntary agreement.
So yes, and only yes, means yes.
[IN HIGH-PITCHED VOICE] Yes, yes, yes-yes-yes!
Oh, my God, shut up, Jeremy.
Okay, thank you, Timmy. I'm sorry. It's super inappropriate.
Can you please send him to the principal's office already?
I mean, he's making so many people here uncomfortable.
translation.ko: 저런 행동 때문에 여러 사람이 불편해해요

translation.en: JEREMY: Give me a break. I was joking.
translation.ko: 왜 이래, 농담이었어 상처를 건드릴 수 있는 발언이라는 거 몰라?

translation.en: No, it can trigger a lot of shit for people, okay?
translation.ko: 상처를 건드릴 수 있는 발언이라는 거 몰라?

translation.en: So why don't you just try being a little bit more sensitive and just...
Just listen. Okay?
Whatever.
FRANKIE: Yo, he called himself cisgendered in seventh period today.
Turn to me.
Girl.
In eighth period, he went on a tear about heteronormativity.
Oh, my God, Tabs.
I love that nail. That's fire.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 태비, 손톱 너무 예쁘다 - 정말 화끈하네 - 그렇지?

translation.en: Yeah...
Oh, snap!
Hey, listen. We don't know for sure
translation.ko: - 깜짝이야! - 얘들아 티미가 변한 게 우리 때문인지 확실하지 않아

translation.en: that this Timmy stuff is because of us.
translation.ko: 티미가 변한 게 우리 때문인지 확실하지 않아

translation.en: But all signs point to "it definitely is."
translation.ko: 하지만 정황상 우리 때문인 게 확실해

translation.en: Well, we'll certainly see at his party tonight.
Scene of the crime.
But we need to proceed with caution.
Agreed. These kinds of spells are no joke.
From now on, when it comes to Timmy, we need to talk through everything we do,
translation.ko: 지금부터 티미에 관해서는 모든 걸 공유해야 해

translation.en: how we do it and when. Okay?
♪ Keep it lit Your man get it ♪
translation.ko: "엄마: 딸, 재미있게 놀고 와" "애덤한테는 비밀로 할게 사랑해, 엄마가"

translation.en: LOURDES: Lily.
Hm? You got all that? Yeah. Yeah.
All right, well, enough with the melo. Picture time!
♪ I'm so fine It's a felony ♪ Work, witches.
♪ I play for keeps And you know I came to win ♪ Yeah, so, anyways... Oh, my God.
Hey, Shelly. You know my favorite kind of movie?
translation.ko: 야, 셸리, 내가 제일 좋아하는 영화 장르가 뭐게?

translation.en: Period pieces.
I'm gonna go to the bathroom.
Tampons are in the medicine cabinet.
It's super cool to shame other girls.
translation.ko: 다른 여자애들 쪽팔리게 만드는 게 멋지네

translation.en: You're the best!
It's so sad that you, like, try to look pretty.
translation.ko: 예뻐 보이려고 애쓴 걸 보니 정말 마음이 짠하다

translation.en: FRANKIE: Careful.
Words hurt.
Bye. What the heck?
Oh, my God. No, I'm fine. Honestly, I'm fine.
TIMMY: Hey. You looking for the bathroom?
There's one just down the hall.
I mean, there's one in there, but it seems... otherwise occupied.
translation.ko: 거기에도 있기는 한데 사람이 있는 거 같아

translation.en: Right.
Lily, uh...
I think I owe you an apology.
The other day, I was...
What's the word I'm looking for?
An asshole?
[CHUCKLES] Yeah. Yeah, no, that's, uh...
That's the word.
I guess it has to do with power,
and me shaming you around something
translation.ko: 너한테 망신 줬던 날은 안 그래도 네가 힘든 날이었을 텐데…

translation.en: that's already pretty vulnerable, so...
translation.ko: 안 그래도 네가 힘든 날이었을 텐데…

translation.en: I guess what I'm trying to say is...
sorry.
Hey. You good?
Yeah.
Yeah, I'm good.
translation.ko: 응, 괜찮아 난 오늘 술 안 마실 건데 네가 정말 파티를 원하면

translation.en: I'm not drinking tonight, but if you really wanna party,
translation.ko: 난 오늘 술 안 마실 건데 네가 정말 파티를 원하면

translation.en: I've got this secret stash of LaCroix in the fridge downstairs.
translation.ko: 지하 냉장고에 숨겨 둔 탄산수 마셔도 돼

translation.en: I also compiled this super eclectic playlist,
and I'm open to any requests.
I think more than anything, tonight I really just wanna dance.
Yeah. Mm-hm.
All right. Sorry. I'll scoot by.
I'm just gonna go ahead and say it. I'm really into Woke Timmy.
translation.ko: 그냥 대놓고 말할게 변한 티미한테 정말 끌려

translation.en: What about proceeding with caution?
LOURDES: Lily's right. We have to be really careful.
translation.ko: 릴리 말이 맞아, 진짜 신중해야 해

translation.en: We've never used a dude's-- Okay, don't. Oh.
You don't have to remind me.
Oh, snap.
Oh, he's playing Princess Nokia.
LOURDES: Bye!
I mean, I just love her politics, you know?
Totally.
I mean, just the way she uses her artistry
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 예술성을 사용해서 인종 문제나 성 문제를 다루잖아

translation.en: to deal with race politics and gender politics
and still just makes, like, the sickest pop jams.
I read this interview with Janet Mock--
Oh, let me get you a glass.
Chivalrous.
Wow, the bar is that low, huh?
Here you go. Thank you.
Of course.
I like your necklace.
Oh. What's that symbol?
I don't know. My mom gave it to me when I was little.
translation.ko: 나도 몰라, 어릴 때 엄마가 주셨어

translation.en: It's dope.
My mom gave me a necklace too.
Guess it's a thing, you know? Moms and necklaces.
I used to think it was kinda whack, but...
Yeah, I don't know.
It's a nice thing, ever since she died, to just remember her by.
translation.ko: 엄마가 돌아가시고 나니까 추억하기 좋은 물건이더라

translation.en: When did she...? When I was 11.
I'm sorry.
No. It's fine.
Can I tell you something kind of embarrassing?
Sure. [CHUCKLES]
I still talk to her. Or try to.
translation.ko: 난 아직도 엄마랑 얘기해, 노력하는 거지

translation.en: I know that's kind of woo-woo or whatever, but, um...
translation.ko: 정신 나간 소리로 들릴 수도 있지만 어릴 때부터 쓰던 점괘판이 있는데

translation.en: I have this Ouija board from when I was a kid, and, um...
translation.ko: 어릴 때부터 쓰던 점괘판이 있는데 가끔 그걸 사용해서

translation.en: I use it sometimes to try...
and reach out, I guess.
I don't think that's embarrassing at all. Okay.
I mean, if I'd lost my mom, I'd do the same thing.
translation.ko: 나도 엄마가 돌아가시면 그렇게 할 거 같아

translation.en: Has it worked?
Yeah. Yeah.
What did she say?
She told me to clean my room.
No. Yeah. Like, she really did.
That must've taken a really long time to spell out on a Ouija board.
translation.ko: 점괘판으로 글씨 쓰는 거 진짜 오래 걸리잖아

translation.en: It was definitely, like, a good five minutes or something like that.
TABBY: Guys.
Lily, you need to come right now. It's a party.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay. Yes. Yes.
Do it.
Yo, dude, we need to talk about our science project.

translation.en: Are you coming to eat with us or what? Yeah. Yeah. I'll catch you guys later?
translation.ko: - 점심 우리랑 먹을 거야? - 응, 알았어, 너희는 나중에 보자

translation.en: Girls.
Women.
No, womxn with an X. All right.
I got next.
translation.ko: - 이것이 우리의 가장 놀라운… - 다음은 내 차례

translation.en: Don't touch that.
LILY: Isaiah.
What the shit? [ALL GIGGLE] JACOB: You still staying for dinner?

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, if it's cool with you.
JACOB: Yeah. It's cool.
Yo, I'm going out.
LILY: Let's go upstairs. Okay.
translation.ko: 위층으로 가자 - 그래 - 쟤 진짜 섹시하다

translation.en: Wait, let's all hang together. Yeah?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 다 같이 놀지 않을래? 그럴래?

translation.en: I mean...
Sure. Jacob?
Look, we can do this stuff in an hour. Let's just hang out with the girls.
Yeah, no, I'm good. You go ahead. Wait, you sure?
Yup.
Suit yourself, dude. Let's go.
Come on!
So you've really never played Two Truths One Lie before?
translation.ko: '진실 둘, 거짓 하나' 게임을 한 번도 안 해봤다고?

translation.en: No.
LOURDES: Well, get ready.
FRANKIE: Are you sure we shouldn't check with Jacob one more time?
translation.ko: 제이컵한테 한 번 더 안 물어봐도 될까?

translation.en: "Clean your room."
translation.ko: - 방 치워 - 놀고 싶을 수도 있잖아

translation.en: FRANKIE: Maybe he changed his mind.
translation.ko: - 방 치워 - 놀고 싶을 수도 있잖아 - 마음이 바뀌지 않았을까? - 그래, 누가 먼저 할래?

translation.en: Okay, who wants to go first?
translation.ko: - 마음이 바뀌지 않았을까? - 그래, 누가 먼저 할래?

translation.en: And then, like, maybe we could make this a Spin the Bottle situation.

translation.en: Jesus. Oh, my God!
I'll go first. I'll go first. Thank you.
translation.ko: - 내가 먼저 할게 - 고마워 좋아, 흑인 친구가 더 있으면 좋겠다

translation.en: Okay. Um... I wish I had more Black friends.

translation.en: I am scared for my brother's safety every day.
And I don't like Beyoncé. Okay, someone else.
translation.ko: 비욘세를 안 좋아한다 자, 다른 사람

translation.en: You didn't let us guess.
Well, I said three truths. Wait, you don't like Beyoncé?
translation.ko: - 진실 세 개 말한 거야 - 비욘세를 안 좋아해?

translation.en: No, bitch. I love her.
I'll go.
So my mom gave me this.
And I'm a virgin. [SNORTS, CHUCKLES] What?
Lie! What the hell, man?
That's a lie. You don't know.
Yeah, I know.
TIMMY: You don't know. You don't.
translation.ko: - 알아 - 넌 몰라 - 모르잖아 - 닥쳐, 친구

translation.en: Shut up, bro.
And, uh...
Isaiah and I hooked up.
Wait.
Shit, um...
I'm sorry. I don't know why... LILY: It's okay.
You can talk to us.
Well, um...
It was...
I'm sorry, I just--
I've never told anyone this before.
And...
It's like...
Jacob's my best friend.
And he would...
Have you and Isaiah ever talked about it?
You kidding me?
He won't even look at me since it happened.
translation.ko: 그 사건 이후로 날 쳐다보지도 않아

translation.en: Shit.
I'm sorry.
It's just...
It's felt good when it's been with girls as well, so...
Oh, God. I don't know.
It's just hard for dudes.
I feel like there's no room to be...
Everyone just assumes you're just gay, and that's fine.
You know, there's nothing wrong with that at all.
I just...
I like both. You know?
ADAM: Hello?
Oh, shit. You guys gotta leave.
Wait, what? LILY: I'm sorry.
He's gonna kill us if he hears us.
translation.ko: - 우리 있는 거 알면 죽일 거야 - 응

translation.en: Okay. Over there. Look, I'll go distract him. Okay?
Isaiah told you he's not coming home for dinner?

translation.en: Yeah, he went out. I don't know. He what?
Yeah, he went out.
Dad, how was your trip?
It was good. It was real good. Thanks for asking.
translation.ko: 좋았단다, 정말 좋았어 물어봐 줘서 고맙구나

translation.en: Made some real breakthroughs in some of my groups.
Oh, yeah? Yeah.
Like what?
There's a lot of pain for these men
living just under the surface, especially now.

translation.en: I'll get the chicken.
Mm. Here, let me help. It's fine.
No, I want to.
JACOB: Fine.
HELEN: Thank you.
As this garment glows in light,
I draw you closer to me this night.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 당신을 더 가까이 끌어당깁니다

translation.en: Hi, I was just wondering if I left my sweatshirt in here. Um...
translation.ko: 저기, 혹시 내가 스웨터 두고 왔나 해서

translation.en: No. No, I don't think so.
Are you, uh... Were you going to bed?
It's only, like, 8:00.
No, I'm, um...
I'm, um, meditating.
Oh. Shit. Yeah.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to interrupt...
No. No, it's cool.
You take these? Yeah.
They're amazing.
Thanks.
Listen, I, uh...
I just wanna say, um, thank you.
For today.
I just feel like a massive...
weight lifted off my shoulders.
Like I can just finally be myself.
If that makes sense.
It does.
JACOB: Hey, Timmy!
I guess biology calls. Okay.
[CHUCKLES] I mean, you know...
the other biology.
Right.
Timmy, Jacob's been calling for you.
Um, I was just looking for my sweatshirt.
I'm sorry. [GIGGLES]
Yeah, I'm gonna-- Okay.
Yeah, okay. See ya.
Oh, my...!
♪ Go, go ♪
Isaiah. Are you sleepwalking again? Come on.
ISAIAH: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
Let's get you back to bed.
GIRL: What? Excuse me!
Okay, uh...
Um, quiet down, please.
I have some very difficult news
to share with you this morning. Um...
This morning, Timmy Andrews was found dead in his bedroom.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침, 티미 앤드루스가 방에서 죽은 채로 발견됐어

translation.en: The cause of death is believed to have been suicide.
There are counselors...
LOURDES: Lily.
This can't be happening.
He was just here.
I mean...
Do you think that...?
Do you think that we're sort of responsible?
It's, like, he told us this huge secret.
This huge secret that he clearly was not ready to deal with.

translation.en: No.
No, something doesn't add up.
He came to my room last night.
And he was...
He told me he felt like a weight lifted.
Just the two of you?
This is stupid, but I did this, like, love spell
and then he came right into my room and he--
He kissed me.
What?
He kissed me.
He was-- He was already under the influence of a spell.
This is so jacked up.
I'm sorry, okay? Okay?
Was all of this just like some game to you?
What? All of this work that we did together
translation.ko: - 뭐? - 우리가 같이 한 모든 일은

translation.en: was about building trust, about building community
and not letting some stupid crush get in the way of everything we've--
translation.ko: 한낱 그런 짝사랑 때문에 우리가 하는 일에…

translation.en: I know!
Do you?
I think we should take a break from magick.
If we're not gonna use our power responsibly,
then we shouldn't be using it at all.
Agreed.
Lily.
ADAM: I wanna talk today about weakness.
Because when one of us is weak...
all of us are weak.
But how do we alchemize weakness into sovereign power?
translation.ko: 어떻게 하면 나약함을 최고의 힘으로 변화시킬 수 있을까요?

translation.en: How do we eliminate the weakest among us
so that the strongest can thrive?
You all know my son Jacob.
Come here, son.
Dad...
Come here.
My son lost a friend today.
No. No, we all face tragedy every day.
The question is, how do we face it?
It's okay.
Dad, no. It's okay.
You're not weak.
You're not weak.
He was weak.
It's okay.
You're not weak.
ADAM: Can't sleep? [GASPS]
Me neither.
Lily, I wanna apologize...
for being so tough on you.
You know, it wasn't always so easy for me, raising three boys on my own.
translation.ko: 나한테 쉽지 않은 일이었어 나 혼자 아들 셋을 키우다 보니까

translation.en: I had to set very strict rules and keep 'em in line.
I know that's not how you and your mom operate...
translation.ko: 너랑 네 엄마는 다르다는 거 안다

translation.en: I, um...
I wanted to say that I'm sorry.
Thanks.
I know you were close to Timmy too.
Well, I-- I saw you checking out the old family crest, huh?
translation.ko: 오래된 가문 문장 보고 있던 거 맞지?

translation.en: It's actually pretty cool. These go back centuries.
translation.ko: 꽤 멋지지? 몇백 년은 됐을 거다

translation.en: You know, um, snakes are usually considered
scary or dangerous,
but actually in pagan culture, they were symbols of rebirth.
Anyway, it's getting late.
To be continued.
Lily? Are you okay?
Honey. Honey, what happened?
We're not safe. What?
We're not safe here. Wait, listen.
Take a breath. Tell me what happened.
He's dangerous. Who?
Adam. I'm telling you. What? Did something happen?
translation.ko: - 애덤요, 진짜예요 - 뭐? 무슨 일이 있었어?

translation.en: Last night, he said...
And I saw...
He had a...
I just really think we need to go.
I just really think we should go.
Honestly, Lily, you are going through a lot right now.
translation.ko: 릴리, 지금 너한테 많은 일이 있는 거 알아

translation.en: Okay.
Okay, um...
Let us go somewhere new. Huh?
Let's just take a road trip, just take a weekend,
just the two of us, somewhere cool, somewhere fun.
That could be good, right?
We just need to make it through the funeral.
Then I'll make it right.
There's gotta be something here that proves it.
HELEN: Lily?
You ready?
Lily, we gotta go.
What the hell is this?
Where did you find that?
You never told me?
Lily.
It's complicated. No, it's really not.
It's, like, a simple conversation that should have happened a long time ago.
No. You don't--
Hold on. Hold on. No.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 안 돼, 엄마 얘기 들어

translation.en: Don't touch me!
Oh, God.
What?
Say it! It wasn't entirely up to me.
Oh, really? Who else would it have been up to, Mom?
It was your birth mother.
It was the one condition that she had,
that I never reveal to you, and she's...
She didn't want you to know that you were adopted,
and I made a promise to her and...
It was such a...
God, it was a complicated... Why would she want that?
translation.ko: - 맙소사, 너무 복잡해 - 왜 그런 부탁을 해요?

translation.en: 'Cause she...
She had undergone
some trauma.
I was assigned to her at the crisis center here and...
translation.ko: 내가 위기 센터에서 네 친어머니를 담당했어

translation.en: Baby, I'm so sorry.
You guys, I need to talk to you.
I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.ko: - 별로 안 내키는데 - 내 말 들어줘

translation.en: Listen to me. Please.
translation.ko: - 별로 안 내키는데 - 내 말 들어줘 부탁이야

translation.en: There's no one else I can trust.
Fine.
Lily. Don't.
You all right?
I need to take her away from here.
I need to put her first.
LOURDES: You guys, she's not gonna harm anyone.
translation.ko: 릴리가 다른 사람을 해치지는 않을 거야

translation.en: She already did. She's just going through some shit.
translation.ko: - 이미 저질렀어 - 힘든 시기를 지나가고 있는 거야

translation.en: Yeah, well, what happened to our number one rule of the craft?
translation.ko: 그래, 크래프트 첫 번째 규칙은 어쩌고?

translation.en: If a person is a danger to herself or others, they will be bound.
She used her powers irresponsibly.
End of story.
But, like, are we any better, though?
I mean, like, what we did to Timmy.
That wasn't consensual either.
Well, then maybe we should bind ourselves too.
We are bound to each other
and bound from magick.
We prevent ourselves from doing harm.
translation.ko: 우리 스스로가 나쁜 짓을 행하지 못하게 한다

translation.en: We relinquish our powers from this day forth.
ALL: So mote it be.
Let's go.
What? You were right.
I never should've brought you here.
But I need you to agree to one thing.
Whatever this is, whatever's happening here...
translation.ko: 이게 뭐든 여기서 무슨 일이 일어나는 거든

translation.en: I need you to stop it.
What do you mean?
I should've told you.
Not just about your birth mother, but about...
About these...
These powers.
Whatever you call them, Lily, they're-- You knew?
I'm sorry.
I was warned...
that your legacy was a curse.
And that the second they came online,
translation.ko: 그게 드러나는 순간에 내가 막아야 했어

translation.en: I would have to stop them in their tracks, so Lily--
translation.ko: 그게 드러나는 순간에 내가 막아야 했어 그러니까, 릴리…

translation.en: Lily, please.
Honey...
let me take the burden for you.
Let me take your curse so you don't have to carry it.
translation.ko: 내가 네 저주를 덜게 네가 가져갈 필요 없어

translation.en: It has been so painful, you can't imagine...
translation.ko: 얼마나 고통스러웠는지 넌 상상 못 할 거야

translation.en: to watch you understand that you were different and not know why.
translation.ko: 네가 남다른 이유도 모른 채 받아들이는 걸 보느라 힘들었어

translation.en: Now you can see why your difference...
is dangerous.
But I need you to say it with me, Lily.
In the name of Manon...
I give you my power.
You can trust me.
I'm your mother.
My mother would never tell me my difference is dangerous.
translation.ko: 엄마는 내 다름이 위험하다고 하지 않아요

translation.en: Guys?
killed...
me."
You guys.
Who is it?
LOURDES: "T...
Those don't seem to be working anymore.
Thanks to your so-called friends.
You see, that's the thing about girls with power, Lily.
translation.ko: 힘을 가진 여자들의 문제가 바로 그런 거란다, 릴리

translation.en: They're always too weak not to use it against each other.
translation.ko: 너무 나약한 존재라 자기들끼리 겨루고 싸우지

translation.en: What do you want from me?
That's an excellent question.
Oh, you see, Lily....
I want your power.
Where's my mother?
Which one?
Helen.
She's tied up at the moment.
Your real mom....
Well, she's tied up too, in a different way.
translation.ko: 다른 방식이긴 해도 네 생모도 묶여 있지

translation.en: You're a lot like her.
You know, she fought it at first,
but eventually she gave in.
You see, Lily, in order to gain a witch's power,
translation.ko: 잘 들어라, 릴리 마녀의 힘을 얻으려면

translation.en: she has to give them up voluntarily.
So you do have a choice here.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
You'll have to kill me first.
So the easy way.
You guys came for me.
There's no I in "sisterhood," baby.
There is definitely an I in "sisterhood."
FRANKIE: You get my meaning.
What we were saying was.... We're sorry.
We love you, and we unbind you, Lily.
translation.ko: 우린 널 사랑해 널 다시 풀었어, 릴리

translation.en: Guys.
You girls ought to be careful in the woods at night.
A lot of weirdos out here.
We are the weirdos, mister.
No!
You see, Lily, power is order.
It belongs in the hands of those who understand it.
It's been that way for thousands of years.
Timmy's a good example of that.
Until you tried to make him in your own image.
translation.ko: 티미가 너희의 형상으로 바뀌기 전까지 말이야

translation.en: So then I had to kill him...
to restore the order.
Because we are not in your image.
We are your rulers and kings.
The thing is, Lily, you got yourself here.
translation.ko: 중요한 건 말이다, 릴리 네가 자초한 일이야

translation.en: But you're playing with fire,
and I'm gonna watch you burn.
TABBY: South. LOURDES: East.
FRANKIE: North.
Where do you think you're going?
West.
GIRLS [CHANTING]: Air, fire, water, earth.
Air, fire, water, earth.
Air, fire, water, earth.
GIRLS [CHANTING]: Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire.
Lily!
Now it's your turn to burn.
Big day.
Text us after, okay? I will.
And take pics.
That I can't promise.
Hey, girls.
Hey, Ms. Schechner. Hi.
How's the warlock dating pool treatin' ya?
Are you steering clear? LILY: Frankie!

A little, yeah.
FRANKIE: It's just a joke.

All right, let's hit the road, baby girl.
Okay.

Love you. Love you.

You ready?
Hi.
I'm looking for...
